original_text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus, who walk not after the flesh, but after the Spirit.
korean_text: 그러므로 이제 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 자에게는 결코 정죄함이 없나니

sentences.original_text: There is therefore now no condemnation
to them which are in Christ Jesus
who walk not after the flesh
